Name: Suspending meter parking regulations on the Asian Lunar New Year.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to suspending meter parking regulations on the Asian Lunar New Year

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

Attachments.Name: Minutes of the Stated Meeting - August 11, 2022

Summary: This bill would suspend parking meters and muni-meters on the Lunar New Year.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:
      Section 1. Subchapter 2 chapter 1 of title 19 of the administrative code of the city of New York is amended by adding a new section 19-163.3 to read as follows:
      � 19-163.3. a. No parking meter or muni-meter shall be activated on the Lunar New Year.
      b. The date of the Lunar New Year is the same as the date set forth in subdivision c of section 19-163. 
      � 2. This local law takes effect immediately.
       
Session 12
